epic.title: Core CMS Functionality
epic.description: This epic covers the core functionality for managing content in the Content Management System (CMS), including creation, editing, deletion, and authentication.

stories.title: Basic Content Creation and Editing
stories.description: Enable authenticated users to create, edit, and delete content pages within the CMS after logging in with Auth0.
acceptanceCriteria: User can log in via Auth0 before accessing content creation features.
User can create a new content page with title and body text.
User can edit existing content and save changes.
Changes are reflected immediately in the CMS interface.

tasks.title: Integrate Auth0 for CMS authentication
tasks.description: Implement login flow using Auth0 and restrict content management features to authenticated users.

tasks.title: Implement content creation functionality
tasks.description: Allow authenticated users to create new content pages with a title and body text.

tasks.title: Implement content editing functionality
tasks.description: Allow authenticated users to edit existing content pages and save changes, with updates shown immediately.

tasks.title: Implement content deletion functionality
tasks.description: Allow authenticated users to delete content pages from the CMS.

notes: Requirement updated to specify Auth0 as the authentication provider. Assumes Auth0 integration will handle user login and session management before allowing content CRUD operations. Non-functional requirements: Page save actions <2 seconds, support at least 50 concurrent editing sessions, Auth0 login completes <3 seconds under normal load.
